# AUx (Agentic Unix)

> AUx is a collection of **atomic agent skills** that super-charge classic Unix commands with reason-based paramter injection and concurrency.

---

## Agent Instructions

Use the links below as the recommended progressive disclosure entrypoints.

## Documentation Index

- [README](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/JordanGunn/aux/refs/heads/master/README.md): Overview, execution model, and quick start.
- [Documentation Index](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/JordanGunn/aux/refs/heads/master/docs/.INDEX.md): Comprehensive documentation index.
